_sText:
This map contains a couple of changes to one of my other maps, dm_scoutingouting, that provide a completely different gaming experience.

1. A spawn house was added for each team, with a team-specific buy zone, giving the newly-spawned protection and choice as to what gun to use.

2. The middle stone wall was moved so as to give the spawned protection while coming out of their spawn house.

3. A bridge was added to bridge the gap between the two sides.
